Name: set_global_flag
Description: set a global flag with index param to 1

Name: rand
Description: rolls a random number between 0 and param:upper

Parameters.Name: upper
Parameters.Description: range to roll the number within

Name: set_local_flag
Description: sets a local flag of param:index to 1

Name: clear_local_flag
Description: sets a local flag of param:index to 0

Name: get_local_flag
Description: returns value of local flag of param:index

Name: clear_all_local_flags
Description: sets all local flags to 0

Name: retrieve
Description: retrieves a stored value from param:index

Name: store
Description: stores param:val into param:index

Name: action_count
Description: returns number of actions taken by the script owner

Name: turn_count
Description: returns global turn count

Name: time_of_day
Description: returns whether it is dawn (0), day (1), dusk (2), or night (3)

Name: get_current_hp_abs
Description: gets the script owner's current HP absolute value

Name: get_current_hp_pct
Description: gets the script owner's current HP percentage

Name: get_current_tp_abs
Description: gets the script owner's current TP absolute value

Name: get_current_tp_pct
Description: gets the script owner's current TP percentage

Name: set_action_multiple_counter
Description: set the counter used in 0xCC (turn_count_multiple_of_value) to param:value

Name: input_read_allies_search_damage_type
Description: reads allies' inputs and checks if any input a skill with damage type param:type

Parameters.Name: type
Parameters.Description: bit field bit for damage type

Name: action_attack
Description: use a basic attack

Name: action_skill
Description: use skill param:skill_id, level 1

Name: action_escape
Description: flee/run away from battle

Name: action_defend
Description: use the defend command

Name: action_summon_ally
Description: summons param:count param:enemy_id to the battle. param3's function is uncertain, but it seems to be a flag for whether the summoner should be replaced by the summoned

Name: action_leveled_skill
Description: use skill param:skill_id, param:level

Name: action_team_skill
Description: perform team skill with param:skill_id, requiring param:count instances of monster param:monsterid

Parameters.Name: monster_id
Parameters.Description: id of the ally monster required

Parameters.Name: count
Parameters.Description: number of allies needed to cast

Name: action_team_skill_multi_ally
Description: perform team skill with param:skill_id, requiring param:count1 instances of monster param:monster_id1 and param:count2 instances of monster param:monster_id2

Parameters.Name: count1
Parameters.Description: number of first required monster needed

Parameters.Name: count2
Parameters.Description: number of second required monster needed

Name: action_sacrifice_summon
Description: removes user from battle and summons param:count instances of param:monster_id

Name: action_fusion_summon
Description: removes param:monster_id1 and param:monster_id2 from battle and summons param:monster_id3. note that this force casts skill 0xD7 (Focus)

Parameters.Name: monster_id1
Parameters.Description: first monster required for the fusion

Parameters.Name: monster_id2
Parameters.Description: second monster required for the fusion

Name: action_throw_ally
Description: search for param:monster_id and, if present, if param:targets is 0, use single target throw and if 1, use all-target throw. set skill level to param:skill_level

Parameters.Name: targets
Parameters.Description: is it single target or multi-target?

Name: action_pass
Description: pass the turn, taking no action at all

Name: action_team_summon
Description: summon param:summon_count instances of param:summoned_monster_id. requires param:team_count instances of param:summoning_monster_id, not including the monster performing the summon. param5 and 6 are unknown.

Parameters.Name: team_count
Parameters.Description: amount of monsters, not counting the summoner, required to summon

Name: target_ally_with_buff
Description: search the user's team for people who have param:buff_or_debuff and target the first one found

Parameters.Name: buff_or_debuff
Parameters.Description: should we search for a buff or a debuff? 1 = buff, anything else = debuff

Name: target_enemy_with_buff
Description: search the opposing team for people who have param:buff_or_debuff and target the first one found

Parameters.Name: buff_or_debuff
Parameters.Description: should we search for a buff or a debuff? 1 = buff, anything else = debuff

Name: target_ally_with_weap_elem_buff
Description: searches for allies with elemental weapon enchantments and targets the first one found

Name: target_standard
Description: standard targeting, based on the targeting algorithm

Name: target_lowest_hp
Description: attack the party member with the lowest HP

Name: target_highest_hp
Description: target the party member with the highest HP

Name: target_lowest_TP
Description: target the character with the least TP, respecting the target team of the skill. note: yes, this is how longicorns prioritize cover targets

Name: target_lowest_TP_copy
Description: a complete copy of 0xA3. unused. I suspect this was supposed to be "target_highest_TP" but due to a bug, it functions identically to 0xA3

Name: target_lowest_level
Description: target the character with the lowest level

Name: target_highest_level
Description: target the character with the highest level

Name: target_front_row
Description: targets the front row

Name: target_rear_row
Description: targets the rear row

Name: target_self
Description: targets self

Name: target_ally_with_ailment
Description: targets an ally with ailment param:ailment

Name: target_enemy_with_ailment
Description: targets an enemy with ailment param:ailment

Name: target_ally_without_ailment
Description: targets an ally that does not have param:ailment

Name: target_class
Description: targets player characters with param:class_id

Parameters.Name: class_id
Parameters.Description: class to be targeted. only applies to mainclass.

Name: target_random_row
Description: target a row with no weighted preference

Name: target_one_front_and_rear_row
Description: selects two targets - one in front and one in back. used for clionean's change skill

Name: run_script_at_action_time
Description: re-run the script when it's time to act rather than at the beginning of the turn. this allows the AI to react to the events of the turn instead of being locked in at the start.

Name: cancel_run_script_at_action_time
Description: undoes the effects of 0xB1

Name: action_time_turn
Description: checks if this is a standard turn (0) or a turn that is run at action time from 0xB1 (1)

Name: skill_is_castable
Description: check if param:skill_id can be cast

Name: ally_input_skill_of_damage_type
Description: checks other allies if skill of param:damage_type was input

Name: allies_on_row_below_hp_threshold
Description: checks if any allies on param:row are below param:hp_percentage

Parameters.Name: row
Parameters.Description: 0 = any row, 1 = front row, 2 = rear row. will automatically correct to 0 if it's a monster

Name: enemies_on_row_below_hp_threshold
Description: checks if any enemies on param:row are below param:hp_percentage

Parameters.Name: row
Parameters.Description: 0 = any row, 1 = front row, 2 = rear row. will automatically correct to 0 if it's a monster

Name: enemy_input_skill_of_damage_type
Description: checks if enemies input skill with param:damage_type

Parameters.Name: damage_type
Parameters.Description: 1 = cut, 2 = bash, 4 = stab, 8 = fire, 10 = ice, 20 = volt, 40 = almighty

Name: enemy_input_skill
Description: check if enemies input skill param:skill_id

Name: target_lowest_hp_pct
Description: has one decimal place precision

Name: target_highest_hp_pct
Description: has one decimal place precision

Name: target_lowest_tp_pct
Description: has one decimal place precision

Name: target_lowest_tp_pct
Description: probably should have been highest TP percentage

Name: action_item
Description: uses param:item. does not need to be in the inventory.

Name: specific_ally_has_ailment
Description: check param:monster_id for param:ailment

Name: self_hp_below_threshold
Description: checks if the character's hp percentage is below param:hp_percentage

Name: self_tp_below_threshold
Description: checks if the character's tp percentage is below param:tp_percentage

Name: ally_party_size_lower_than_x
Description: checks if there are fewer party members than param:party_size on the team

Name: enemy_party_size_lower_than_x
Description: checks if there are fewer party members than param:party_size on the enemy team

Name: ally_below_hp_threshold
Description: checks if any allies are below param:hp_percentage

Name: enemy_below_hp_threshold
Description: checks if any enemies are below param:hp_percentage

Name: self_ailment_check
Description: check self for param:ailment

Name: ally_ailment_check
Description: check all allies for param:ailment

Name: enemy_ailment_check
Description: check all enemies for param:ailment

Name: ally_no_ailment_check
Description: check all allies and return true if anyone doesn't have param:ailment

Name: enemy_no_ailment_check
Description: check all enemies and return true if anyone doesn't have param:ailment

Name: battle_blindside
Description: checks if the player was blindsided this turn

Name: turn_count_multiple_of_value
Description: check if turn count is a multiple of param:turn_multiple

Name: self_has_buff_or_debuff
Description: checks if self has param:buff_or_debuff of type param:buff_type

Parameters.Name: buff_or_debuff
Parameters.Description: is it a buff or a debuff?

Name: self_count_buff_or_debuff
Description: counts number of param:buff_or_debuff of type param:buff_type on self

Parameters.Name: buff_or_debuff
Parameters.Description: is it a buff or a debuff?

Name: ally_count_buff_or_debuff
Description: counts number of param:buff_or_debuff of type param:buff_type on allies

Parameters.Name: buff_or_debuff
Parameters.Description: is it a buff or a debuff?

Name: enemy_count_buff_or_debuff
Description: counts number of param:buff_or_debuff of type param:buff_type on enemies

Parameters.Name: buff_or_debuff
Parameters.Description: is it a buff or a debuff?

Name: monster_exists
Description: search all allies for param:monster_id and return true if it is found

Name: current_floor
Description: returns the current floor we're on. returns 0 during a sea quest (?)

Name: ally_has_buff_or_debuff
Description: checks if any allies have param:buff_or_debuff of type param:buff_type

Parameters.Name: buff_or_debuff
Parameters.Description: is it a buff or a debuff?

Name: enemy_has_buff_or_debuff
Description: checks if any enemies have param:buff_or_debuff of type param:buff_type

Parameters.Name: buff_or_debuff
Parameters.Description: is it a buff or a debuff?

Name: count_ally_by_type
Description: counts the number of ally of param:monster_id

Name: narmer_can_dive
Description: check if narmer can dive. params should always be 0,2

Name: allow_narmer_to_dive
Description: clears the state that prevents narmer from diving. params should always be 0,2

Name: ally_is_using_skill
Description: reads input of allies and checks if another ally is using param:skill_id

Name: damage_type_of_skill_most_recently_hit_by
Description: checks the damage type of the skill golem was most recently hit by and compares it against param:damage_type

Parameters.Name: damage_type
Parameters.Description: damage type to check. IMPORTANT NOTE: this is shifted left from normal (so fire is 0x10, ice is 0x20, volt is 0x40, etc.)

Name: in_row
Description: checks if character is in param:row

Name: ally_below_tp_threshold
Description: checks if any allies are below param:tp_percentage

Name: hp_pct_of_specified_ally
Description: returns the hp percentage of param:ally_id

Parameters.Name: ally_id
Parameters.Description: ally to get the hp percentage of

Name: tp_pct_of_specified_ally
Description: returns the tp percentage of param:ally_id

Parameters.Name: ally_id
Parameters.Description: ally to get the tp percentage of

Name: ally_has_ailment_at_action_time
Description: same as 0xBF except it's also checked at action time. I think. I'm not actually certain but it's unused in EO3

Name: target_specific_unit
Description: target unit with id param:unit_id. respects the skill's team target. also seems to have a 0xB1 element? I don't know.

Name: ally_alive
Description: check if param:ally_id is alive

Name: count_bunshin_clones
Description: returns number of bunshin clones

Name: self_has_buff_or_debuff_from_skill
Description: checks if user has param:buff_or_debuff from param:skill_id

Name: ally_has_buff_or_debuff_from_skill
Description: checks if any ally has param:buff_or_debuff from param:skill_id

Name: enemy_has_buff_or_debuff_from_skill
Description: checks if any enemy has param:buff_or_debuff from param:skill_id

Name: has_active_beast
Description: checks if the wildling has a beast active

Name: beast_hp_below_threshold
Description: check if the user's beast's hp is below param:hp_percentage

Name: target_beast
Description: target's the owner's beast

Name: do_not_retarget
Description: don't attempt to retarget the skill use at action time

Name: count_enemies_by_type
Description: counts the number of enemies with param:monster_id

Name: hp_pct_of_specified_enemy
Description: returns the hp percentage of param:enemy_id. this function only works on monsters I think

Parameters.Name: enemy_id
Parameters.Description: ally to get the hp percentage of

Name: do_nothing_and_display_message
Description: pass turn and display param:message_id

Name: is_ally_being_targeted
Description: I'm not 100% sure about this but I think it checks if any enemy is using an offensive move

Name: target_ally_being_targeted
Description: target an ally who is the target of an enemy

Name: remove_ailment_at_eot
Description: removes param:ailment at end of turn

Name: pasaran_transform
Description: display param:message then transform into param:count instances of param:monster_id. message after transform will always be "$MONSTER lowered its hand."

Parameters.Name: monster_id
Parameters.Description: id of monster to transform into

Parameters.Name: success
Parameters.Description: whether it works or not, I think

Name: abyssal_god_tentacle_count
Description: returns the number of tentacles alive

Name: cast_regenerator_and_spawn_tentacle
Description: abyssal god function

Name: abyssal_god_transform
Description: transforms abyssal god between offense and defense forms

Name: hp_pct_of_specified_ally
Description: returns the hp percentage of param:ally_id. this function only works on monsters I think

Parameters.Name: ally_id
Parameters.Description: monster to get the hp percentage of

Name: transform_with_messages
Description: summons param:count instances of param:monster_id. displays param:pre_message_id before the transformation and param:post_message_id after the transform.

Parameters.Name: success
Parameters.Description: whether it works or not I think

Parameters.Name: pre_message_id
Parameters.Description: message that plays before the monster is spawned

Parameters.Name: post_message_id
Parameters.Description: message that plays after the monster is spawned
